section.title: Installation of the Grails command line tools
section.para: Download the latest official release of Grails from the Grails download page . Unzip the download to a directory of your choice.
Setup your GRAILS_HOME environment variable pointing to your installation directory of Grails. Also add the $GRAILS_HOME/bin to the PATH variable.

para.note: Please make sure that the environment variable JAVA_HOME is set to the JDK and not the JRE. The JDK is required to develop with Grails.

section.para: Test your installation by opening a command line and running the following command.
This should result in the output of the currently installed Grails version.
